tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geofence_areas (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name TEXT,
    center_latitude DECIMAL,
    center_longitude DECIMAL,
    radius DECIMAL,
    trigger_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_locations (
    user_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    last_update TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, latitude, longitude)
);

CREATE TABLE UserLocations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_locations (
    user_id INT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    timestamp DATETIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp DATETIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    location_history JSON
);

CREATE TABLE user_geofence_mapping (
    mapping_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    geofence_id UUID,
    enter_time TIMESTAMP,
    exit_time TIMESTAMP
);
